wikipedia_page.main: Gordon John Davies (born 3 August 1955) is a Welsh former international footballer. He is the record goalscorer for Fulham and earned 16 caps for Wales between 1979 and 1986, scoring 2 international goals.

response: *Gordon Davies – Fulham F.C. leading goal scorer and Wales international football player
